newsitem.title: UK: Christies auction sales rise in H1.
newsitem.headline: Christies auction sales rise in H1.

text.p: British-based auctioneer and art specialist Christies International Plc International Plc said on Friday that its worlwide auction sales increased to 557 million stg in the first six months of 1997.
It said that this represented an increase of 15 percent in sterling terms and 23 percent in dollar terms over the first six months of 1996.

"The strong sales growth in the first six months of 1997 reflects both the exceptional success of the Loeb collection of impressionist pictures and the continuing widely-based strength of the international art market," said Lord Hindlip, chairman of Christies in a statement.
